channel.title: How can add a P2P client to whonix workstation?
channel.description:
Hello!
My question how can I add (install) a P2P client to Whonix workstation? I run the system in virtualbox. I would like install the DC++ client or gnutella client edonkey etc
Thanks

item.title: How can add a P2P client to whonix workstation?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
direct connect clients supported in Debian. See the power of search engine queries

https://wiki.debian.org/Direct_Connect

Read full topic
item.source: How can add a P2P client to whonix workstation?

item.title: How can add a P2P client to whonix workstation?
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi laller

Whonix is based on Debian so you can install Peer-to-Peer clients or any other software just as you would for Debian.

https://whonix.org/wiki/Install_Software

https://whonix.org/wiki/File_Sharing#Peer-to-Peer_.28P2P.29_File_Sharing

Related:

https://whonix.org/wiki/Avoid_nonfree_software

Read full topic
item.source: How can add a P2P client to whonix workstation?
